# ion-menu-toggle



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

#### menu

string

Optional property that maps to a Menu's `menuId` prop. Can also be `left` or `right` for the menu side. This is used to find the correct menu to toggle


## Attributes

#### menu

string

Optional property that maps to a Menu's `menuId` prop. Can also be `left` or `right` for the menu side. This is used to find the correct menu to toggle
